elements.name: Chlorine
reactions: Cl2 + H2O → HCl + HOCl (Reaction with water)

elements.name: Iron
reactions: Fe + 2HCl → FeCl2 + H2 (Reaction with hydrochloric acid)

elements.name: Cobalt
reactions: Co + 2HCl → CoCl2 + H2 (Reaction with hydrochloric acid)

elements.name: Nickel
reactions: Ni + 2HCl → NiCl2 + H2 (Reaction with hydrochloric acid)

elements.name: Copper
reactions: Cu + 2H2SO4 → CuSO4 + SO2 + 2H2O (Reaction with sulfuric acid)

elements.name: Zinc
reactions: Zn + 2HCl → ZnCl2 + H2 (Reaction with hydrochloric acid)

elements.name: Bromine
reactions: Br2 + H2O → HBr + HOBr (Reaction with water)

elements.name: Silver
reactions: 2Ag + H2S → Ag2S + H2 (Reaction with hydrogen sulfide)

elements.name: Iodine
reactions: I2 + H2O → HI + HOI (Reaction with water)

elements.name: Gold
reactions: Au + HNO3 + 4HCl → HAuCl4 + NO + 2H2O (Aqua regia reaction)

elements.name: Astatine
reactions: At2 + H2O → HAt + HOAt (Reaction with water)
